name: Robot Not Alone
description:
SUMMARY

Do you like platformer and puzzle games? This is your game. Explore the different levels passing the obstacles with the help of your little friend(s).

In the edit mode you will able to place the little robot(s) wherever you want. You can rotate it and move it forward, backward, up, down, left and right.

But keep in mind that you should recover your robots if you want to get the goal.

CONTROLS

-WASD to move

-Space to do a little jump

-E to enter/exit edit mode

-F to recover your robot(s)

-In edit mode, ingame, you'll see the rest
